title: How to Watch ‘Jingle Ball 2024’ on TV and Online for Free
description: The iHeartRadio holiday special features performances from Katy Perry, Gracie Abrams, NCT Dream and Tate McRae, among others
author: Tim Chan
excerpt: The iHeartRadio holiday special also features performances from Katy Perry, Tate McRae, Teddy Swims, Benson Boone and Kane Brown. Livestream here.

Katy Perry, Gracie Abrams, Tate McRae and NCT Dream are among the artists appearing on tonight’s Jingle Ball 2024 special on ABC. Filmed at select stops on this year’s iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour, the two-hour special airs at 8 p.m. ET/PT. Watch the Jingle Ball Tour on TV through your local ABC affiliate. How to Watch 2024 Jingle Ball Special Live Online Don’t have cable? You can livestream the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball special on ABC through DirecTV Stream. The popular streaming service includes a live ABC feed as part of its packages, allowing you to watch Jingle Ball online without cable. DirecTV Stream currently has a free trial promotion going on that you can use to watch the Jingle Ball performances online for free. See full details here.
